column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: expenses related to the obligations of the institution regarding receptions
column16: including in connection with work carried out by the institution’s unit for Scientific and Technological Options Assessment (STOA)
column17: and representation expenses for Members of the institution

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: representation expenses of the President when he or she is travelling outside the places of work

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: representation expenses and the contribution to the secretarial expenses of the President’s office

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: the Secretariat’s reception and representation expenses
column16: including the purchase of items and medals for officials who have completed 15 or 25 years’ service

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: travel and subsistence expenses incurred by VIP visitors to the institution

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: visa costs relating to official travel by Members and staff

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column15: reception and representation expenses and the other specific expenses for Members performing official duties at the European Parliament.

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column17: the cost of contracts with qualified experts and research institutes for studies and other research activities (workshops
column19: expert panels and conferences) carried out for the European Parliament’s governing bodies and the Administration
column20: including for the establishment of the House of European History

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column17: study appraisal costs and STOA’s participation in scientific bodies

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column18: subsistence and incidental expenses of experts and other persons
column19: including petitioners to the European Parliament
column20: invited to take part in committee
column22: study group or working party meetings

column5: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column17: expenditure on calling in outside persons to take part in the work of bodies such as the Disciplinary Board or the Specialised Financial Irregularities Panel.
